snippet.title: Neva | Reveal Trailer | Coming 2024
snippet.description:
Introducing Neva, from the creators of GRIS. Coming to PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S/X, and Nintendo Switch in 2024.

Experience the moving tale of a young woman and her lifelong bond with a magnificent wolf as they embark on a thrilling adventure through a dying world.

Visit https://neva.game for more information.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Neva on Steam ➟ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2420660/Neva/
